SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am45
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am45.model.boards

Class PlayerBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am45.model.boards.PlayerBoard
public class PlayerBoard extends Object
The Board of every player in the game, contains the cards played by the player and counts their resources.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final HashMap<String,PlayableCard>
    grid
    The grid of the player board, every location his identified by a string key that is the concatenation Each location contains or not a single card.
    private List<Integer>
    resources
    The List stores the resources of the player in the following order: ANIMAL, PLANT, INSECT, FUNGI, FEATHER, POTION, SCROLL
    private final Stack<CardData>
    viewGrid
    The grid necessary for the view of the player board, contains the face of the card and its position.

    • grid

      private final HashMap<String,PlayableCard> grid
      The grid of the player board, every location his identified by a string key that is the concatenation Each location contains or not a single card.

    • viewGrid

      private final Stack<CardData> viewGrid
      The grid necessary for the view of the player board, contains the face of the card and its position.

    • resources

      private List<Integer> resources
      The List stores the resources of the player in the following order: ANIMAL, PLANT, INSECT, FUNGI, FEATHER, POTION, SCROLL

    • getResources

      public List<Integer> getResources()
      Returns:
      List of the resources of the card placed on the player board

    • addResources

      public void addResources(String[] resources)
      Add the resources of the played card to the player's player board resources.
      Parameters:
      resources - the resources of the played card

    • checkRequirements

      public boolean checkRequirements(int[] requirements)
      The method checks if the player has enough resources to play the GoldCard.
      Parameters:
      requirements - requirements of the GoldCard to be played
      Returns:
      true if the player has enough resources, false otherwise

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(int x, int y, PlayableCard card)
      Place card in the grid of PlayerBoard
      Parameters:
      x - position of the card
      y - position of the card
      card - card to be placed

    • updateResources

      public void updateResources(String resource, int point)
      Based on the angle card resource add or subtract the points from the player's resources.
      Parameters:
      resource - of the angle being checked
      point - how many points to be added or subtracted

    • getCardFromLocation

      public PlayableCard getCardFromLocation(int x, int y)
      Get card from the grid at the location with coordinates x and y
      Parameters:
      x - position of the card
      y - position of the card
      Returns:
      the card in the position x,y

    • getKey

      private String getKey(int x, int y)
      Generate key for the grid to be associated with each couple of coordinates x and y
      Parameters:
      x - position on the grid
      y - position on the grid
      Returns:
      String of the generated key

    • hasCard

      public boolean hasCard(int x, int y)
      Check if there is a card in the position x and y
      Parameters:
      x - position to be checked.
      y - position to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if there is a card in the position, false otherwise.
